title: veeNa abhEri
sahitya:
veeNaabhEri vENuvaadyaadi vinOdini mOdini raksha maam

(veeNaabhEri)



caraNam



ghONee vadanaadi vinutacaritE

guNarahitE vidhi guruguha mahitE

eneelOcani paapavimOcani

indirEsha sahOdari talOdari



ciTTai swaram



R,S,NSGGRS,MMGG | RRS, SPMP | MMGG RRS, ||

NDPSS, MMPPSP,S MG | ,MGR S,ND | [M,G RS,N ||

(veeNaabhEri)
